Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: L68stingray
Reviews.Content: This is a step up for me, I owned a Nikon D60 which I purchased in 2008.  So far the camera has exceeded my expectations.  It is easy to get started taking great pictures.  I downloaded the user manual to my iPhone so if I need to find out about a feature I have it with me all the time and I don't have to carry around the manual.  I will put it to the test on a 15 day Caravan from Orange County, California  up to Oregon and then over to South Dakota before returning home.
